======Controls the fire rate of the autogun.======
======sidebar [[SideBarPage_Convars.wiki|SideBarPage_Convars]]======
= Description =

Controls the fire rate of the autogun, and does not affect the minigun. Lower values = faster fire rate. Setting this cvar too low will result in prediction bugs due to differences in normally shared code between the Client and Server.
